item.title: ethnicity, color or faith what has happened to the United States of America and the good for all ?
item.description:
ethnicity, color or faith what has happened to the United States of America and the good for all ?

In the first election since President Barack Obama galvanized black and brown voters to put him in office, Democratic nominee Hillary Clinton told the nation's largest gathering of African American and Hispanic journalists she sees a political landscape favorable for immigration reform and promised programs to tackle economic empowerment.

item.title: Somebody has to keep him under control…
item.description:
Somebody has to keep him under control…

Winking at a Mitt Romney gaffe from his 2012 presidential bid, Clinton wrote Thursday: "We know a guy with a binder, @realDonaldTrump. (He might not take your calls, though.)" The Democratic nominee was referencing Romney's remarks during a 2012 president debate about gender equality, when he said he'd reviewed "binders full of women" for positions in his administration as governor of Massachusetts.

item.title: Between Hillary's lies and deception… Trumps insane rantings… Who the hell to choose ?
item.description:
Between Hillary's lies and deception… Trumps insane rantings… Who the hell to choose ?

After a relatively quiet day for Donald Trump's campaign, twitter users grew antsy for the next bit of drama. And so, #NextTrumpGaffe was born, with thousands of tweets guessing what the presidential candidate's next trending moment would be. Read or Share this story: http://usat.ly/2aUMcoC

item.title: And now more important news other than politics…
item.description:
And now more important news other than politics…

NEW ORLEANS (AP) - Amid the craze over virtual characters in the smartphone-based "Pokemon Go" game, a Pokemon that people can touch in the physical world has mysteriously appeared in New Orleans. Someone put up a statue of the iconic Pokemon, Pikachu, at the center of a broken fountain in a park over the weekend.

item.title: A Hard Walk in Another's Shoes...to both candidates
item.description:
A Hard Walk in Another's Shoes...to both candidates

Only a military mom could write such a fantastic testimony and rebuke to the Muslim pawn used by Hillary's campaign at the Dem Convention to trash Donald Trump. The Facebook letter below is so great and so powerful that it's gone viral.

item.title: Viewpoints on urban culture...
item.description:
Viewpoints on urban culture...

James Baldwin has been seen as a prophet, as a suspect, as the greatest American essayist in history. He was also a sharp examiner of the urban environment. He captured the rhythms of city life, the character and habits and various circumstances of their inhabitants, as well as he captured the broader character of cultures, populations, and institutions.

item.title: Challenge...August 2, 2016 How did our political system get so broken !
item.description:
Challenge...August 2, 2016 How did our political system get so broken !

Nearly everything about this presidential campaign is upside-down. Democrats are waving American flags and acting tough on Russia. Republicans suddenly no longer think plagiarizing major speeches from Michelle Obama, or dramatically raising the federal minimum wage, are a problem at all.

item.title: Challange July 3, 2016
item.description:
Challange July 3, 2016

Tallahassee dealing with water pollution just before holiday.

item.title: Being Smart about energy production and energy consumption go hand in hand...
item.description:
Being Smart about energy production and energy consumption go hand in hand...

Access the survey results 'State of Industrial Internet Application Development' to learn about latest challenges, trends and opportunities with Industrial IoT, brought to you in partnership with GE Digital. The sun has an efficiency problem. Yes, it produces enough energy every hour to power 2,880 trillion light bulbs.
